img_above_text:
![Wukong Sandgate 64.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/b/be/Wukong_Sandgate_64.jpg)
You’ll find a new Shrine to rest at, not far to the left of the sealed door. Just beyond the Shrine is a cave entrance, guarded by a Rat Soldier and Rat Archer supporting him on some scaffolding. Skirt around the soldier to engage the archer first.
img_below_text:
On the other end of the tunnel, the path will open up into a large interior valley with the sun streaming down on the left. Stick to the right side for now, and you’ll find a large door that can’t be opened from this side.
![Wukong Sandgate 66.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/0/0b/Wukong_Sandgate_66.jpg)

content.text:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

            Image Position:

            Context:
            - Preceding Text: "![Wukong Sandgate 64.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/b/be/Wukong_Sandgate_64.jpg)
You’ll find a new Shrine to rest at, not far to the left of the sealed door. Just beyond the Shrine is a cave entrance, guarded by a Rat Soldier and Rat Archer supporting him on some scaffolding. Skirt around the soldier to engage the archer first."
            - Following Text: "On the other end of the tunnel, the path will open up into a large interior valley with the sun streaming down on the left. Stick to the right side for now, and you’ll find a large door that can’t be opened from this side.
![Wukong Sandgate 66.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/0/0b/Wukong_Sandgate_66.jpg)"

            Your task:
            1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
            2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.

img_summary: The image depicts a scene from the game "Black Myth: Wukong," showing the protagonist in a dimly lit cave near a large, ornate sealed door. This area is described in the context as being just beyond a shrine and guarded by enemies, leading to a tunnel that opens into a larger area. The image serves to illustrate the player's current location and the immediate challenge of navigating past the sealed door and enemies.
